mapper.select:
-- 查询有几个评委给指定选手打分，指定活动，指定环节
SELECT activate.id AS activate_id, step.id AS step_id, scorevalue.player_id, scorevalue.judge_id, activate.title AS act_title, step.title AS step_title, player.`name` AS player_name, judge.judge_name, GROUP_CONCAT(scoreitem.item_name) AS score_item_list, Sum(scorevalue.num_value) AS sum_score, SUM(scoreitem.max_score) AS max_score, player.company, player.dep, player.post FROM scorevalue LEFT JOIN scoreitem ON scorevalue.scoreitem_id = scoreitem.id LEFT JOIN step ON scoreitem.step_id = step.id LEFT JOIN activate ON activate.id = step.activate_id LEFT JOIN player ON scorevalue.player_id = player.id LEFT JOIN judge ON scorevalue.judge_id = judge.id WHERE activate.id = #{actid} GROUP BY scorevalue.strone ORDER BY activate.id,step.id,player.id,judge.id
